spack.dependencies: ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^fftw@3.3.10/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' fftw@3.3.10 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi ~openmp) ^plumed@2.6.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' plumed@2.6.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} +mpi ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317) ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^cmake@3.21.4/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cmake@3.21.4 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
